languages.text: "Раскрой истину врагу, и он поранится об нее".

traits.locale_text: "Раскрой истину врагу, и он ей поранится. Так говорят ткачи".

languages.text: "Reveal the truth to the enemy, and they will harm themselves with it."
languages.original_text: "Раскрой истину врагу, и он поранится об нее".

traits.locale_text: "Reveal the truth to the enemy, and they will hurt themselves with it."
"Reveal the truth to the enemy, and they will hurt themselves with it."
"Reveal the truth to the enemy, and they will hurt themselves with it."
"Reveal the truth to the enemy, and they will hurt themselves with it."
"Reveal the truth to the enemy, and they will harm themselves with it."
"Reveal the truth to the enemy, and they will harm themselves with it."

languages.text: "Offenbart dem Feind die Wahrheit, dann wird er sich damit selbst schaden."
languages.original_text: "Reveal the truth to the enemy, and they will harm themselves with it."

traits.locale_text: "Offenbart dem Feind die Wahrheit, dann wird er sich damit selbst schaden."

languages.text: «Al revelar la verdad al enemigo, el enemigo se hiere con ella».
languages.original_text: "Reveal the truth to the enemy, and they will harm themselves with it."

traits.locale_text: «Al revelar la verdad al enemigo, el enemigo se hiere con ella».

languages.text: 「敵に真実を明かし、それで自分たちを傷つけるハメになるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Reveal the truth to the enemy, and they will harm themselves with it."

traits.locale_text: 「敵に真実を明かし、それで自分たちを傷つけるハメになるのだ」

languages.text: “将真相放在敌人眼前，真相便会让他们刺伤自己。”
languages.original_text: "Reveal the truth to the enemy, and they will harm themselves with it."

traits.locale_text: “将真相放在敌人眼前，真相便会让他们刺伤自己。”

languages.text: « Pour faire du tort à l'ennemi, il n'y a rien de mieux que de lui révéler la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "Reveal the truth to the enemy, and they will harm themselves with it."

traits.locale_text: « Pour faire du tort à l'ennemi, il n'y a rien de mieux que de lui révéler la vérité. »

languages.text: "Hakikati düşmana belli edersen bu hakikatle kendilerine zarar vereceklerdir."
languages.original_text: "Reveal the truth to the enemy, and they will harm themselves with it."
